I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
l: pos n
h: pos n
a: pos n
s: pos n
Hsa: s <> a
Hsh: s <> h
Hsl: s <> l
Hah: a <> h
Hal: a <> l
Hhl: h <> l
lt: list (list bool * list bool)
i: nat
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
(i, main_init) // (i, v) ->> (13 + i, v[(Zero :: nil)/s][nil/a][nil/h][nil/l])

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
main_init = empty_stack s i ++ empty_stack a (3 + i) ++ empty_stack h (6 + i) ++ empty_stack l (9 + i) ++ PUSH s Zero :: nil : list (bsm_instr n)
Notation pos := Fin.t
Notation Zero := false
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
VectorDef.splitat : forall l0 r : nat, vec ?A (l0 + r) -> vec ?A l0 * vec ?A r where ?A : [n : nat s : pos n a : pos n h : pos n l : pos n Hsa : s <> a Hsh : s <> h Hsl : s <> l Hah : a <> h Hal : a <> l Hhl : h <> l lt : list (list bool * list bool) i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat s : pos n a : pos n h : pos n l : pos n Hsa : s <> a Hsh : s <> h Hsl : s <> l Hah : a <> h Hal : a <> l Hhl : h <> l lt : list (list bool * list bool) i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
decoder_spec_ok : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (q s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (th tl : list bool) (lr : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (length ll) ++ One :: lc -> st = (s, v[lc/c][(th ++ v#>h)/h][(tl ++ v#>l)/l]) -> (i, decoder c h l q s i (ll ++ (th, tl) :: lr)) // (i, v) -> > st
decoder_spec_rec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (q s i : nat) (mm ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (th tl : list bool) (lr : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (w : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (length ll) ++ One :: lc -> mm = ll ++ (th, tl) :: lr -> w = (s, v[lc/c][(th ++ v#>h)/h][(tl ++ v#>l)/l]) -> (i, decoder c h l q s i mm) // (i, v) -> > w
full_dec_start_spec_1 : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> forall (p q i : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c <> nil -> (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (5 + i, v)
full_dec_spec_rec1 : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
full_dec_spec_rec2 : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> forall (p q i k : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (S k) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
full_decoder_ko_spec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k)) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
full_dec_spec_rec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (i, v[lc/c][(hh ++ v#>h)/h][(ll ++ v#>l)/l])
bsm_steps_POP_1_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
copy_rev_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y][(rev l ++ v#>z)/z] -> (i, copy_rev_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (9 + i, w)
copy_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (16 + i, w)
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}
full_decoder_ok_spec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln -> v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (p, v[nil/c][hh/h][ll/l])
bsm_steps_PUSH_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> {a : nat | a < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -[a] -> st}
decoder_spec_nok_1 : forall (c h l : pos n) (q s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat), v#>c = list_repeat Zero k -> exists r : nat, (i, decoder c h l q s i ll) // (i, v) -> > (q, v[(list_repeat Zero r)/c])
cs_spec_rec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (l m : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>y = m -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z) /\ (l = m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (p, w)) /\ (l <> m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (q, w))
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
decoder_spec_nok_2 : forall (c h l : pos n) (q s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat), v#>c = list_repeat Zero k ++ lc -> length ll <= k -> exists r : nat, (i, decoder c h l q s i ll) // (i, v) -> > (q, v[(list_repeat Zero r ++ lc)/c])
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b] -> st}
compare_stack_neq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x <> v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
move_rev_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack x y i) // (i, v) -> > (7 + i, w)
compare_stack_eq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (p, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
increment_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (l m : list bool), list_bool_succ l m -> v#>x = l -> (i, increment x y i) // (i, v) -> > (15 + i, v[m/x])
tile_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (high low : list bool) (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), st = (length (tile x y high low) + i, v[(high ++ v#>x)/x][(low ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, tile x y high low) // (i, v) -> > st
compare_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), exists (j : nat) (w : vec (list bool) n), (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (j, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z /\ (v#>x = v#>y /\ j = p \/ v#>x <> v#>y /\ j = q))
increment_spec_1 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat) (l : list bool), v#>x = list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: l -> (i, increment x y i) // (i, v) -> > (15 + i, v[(list_repeat Zero k ++ One :: l)/x])
increment_spec_2 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat), v#>x = list_repeat One k -> (i, increment x y i) // (i, v) -> > (15 + i, v[(list_repeat Zero (S k))/x])
decoder_length : forall (c h l : pos n) (q s i : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)), length (decoder c h l q s i lt) = length_decoder lt
transfer_ones_spec_1 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (b : bool) (k : nat) (l : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>x = list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: l -> st = (p, v[l/x][(list_repeat b k ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, transfer_ones x y i p q b) // (i, v) -> > st
list_One_Zero_not : forall (a b : nat) (l : list bool), list_repeat One a ++ Zero :: l <> list_repeat One b
decoder = fun (c h l : pos n) (q : nat) => let decoder_error := PUSH c Zero :: POP c q q :: nil in fix decoder (s i : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) {struct lt} : list (bsm_instr n) := match lt with | nil => decoder_error | (th, tl) :: lt0 => POP c (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) q :: tile h l th tl ++ PUSH c Zero :: POP c s s :: decoder s (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) lt0 end : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> nat -> nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments decoder _ _ _ (_ _ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope

increment_erase = fun i p : nat => increment s a i ++ empty_stack h (15 + i) ++ empty_stack l (18 + i) ++ empty_stack a (21 + i) ++ PUSH l Zero :: POP l p p :: nil : nat -> nat -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments increment_erase (_ _)%nat_scope
